skills.description: You can't include non-《Saiyan》 Battle Cards in your deck.

Choose 1 card from your life and add it to your hand : Look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 red or green 《Saiyan》 card or {King Vegeta's Dynasty} among them and add it to your hand, then shuffle your deck.

When you have {King Vegeta's Dynasty} in your Battle Area and 3 or more cards in your energy : You may draw 1 card, choose up to 1 of your energy and switch it to Active Mode, and flip this card over.

back.name: King Vegeta, Leader of the Saiyans

skills.description: ・You may choose 1 red or green 《Saiyan》 card in your Battle Area and place it in its owner's Drop Area. If you do, draw 1 card, and this card gets +5000 power and <DOUBLE STRIKE> for the duration of the turn.
・Choose 1 Battle Card in your hand with an energy cost of 2 or less and play it with its skills negated for the duration of the turn, then draw 1 card.

When {King Vegeta's Dynasty} in your Battle Area is placed in its owner's Drop Area, activate this skill. If {Raditz, Earth Invader} isn't in play in your Battle Area, you may play this card from your hand.
Choose 1 card in your life and add it to your hand : This card gets +5000 power and <CRITICAL> for the duration of the turn.
(Play this card from your hand when you have red and green cards in your Combo Area.)
(If this card is placed in an Energy Area from any area, it must be placed there in Rest Mode.)
Only 1 {Fated Kaio-Ken Son Goku} can be played in your Battle Area.

Choose 1 card in your life and add it to your hand : If your life is at 3 or less and your Leader Card is a 《Saiyan》 card, this card gains <DOUBLE STRIKE> and <DUAL ATTACK> for the duration of the turn.
(Place and activate this card in your Battle Area. It remains in your Battle Area until you activate another <FIELD> . When you do, place this card in its owner's Drop Area.)
(If this card is placed in an Energy Area from any area, it must be placed there in Rest Mode.)

When this card is placed in your Battle Area and your Leader Card is a 〈King Vegeta〉 card, choose up to 1 《Saiyan》 card with an energy cost of 2 or less in your hand, and play it with its skills negated for the duration of the turn. If you played a card, draw 2 cards.
When your opponent attacks with a card, you may choose 1 red card in your Energy Area, switch it to Rest Mode, and place this card in its owner's Drop Area. If you do, negate the attack.
